subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Buffalo’s season, fraught with injuries, disappointment and player unrest, has been reduced to one final game, a chance to deny Ryan’s former team, the Jets, a berth in the postseason.
snippet: Buffalo’s season, fraught with injuries, disappointment and player unrest, has been reduced to one final game, a chance to deny Ryan’s former team, the Jets, a berth in the postseason.
